thread.title: Look up! Northern Lights fill sky in Southern New England
thread.title_full: Look up! Northern Lights fill sky in Southern New England

title: Look up! Northern Lights fill sky in Southern New England
text: {p}{strong}From Mark Searles, Storm Team 10 Chief Meteorologist:{/strong}{/p}{p}Dry weather continues to close out the work week. A clear sky should allow New Englanders to {a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog/northern-lights-likely-to-be-visible-thursday-night-into-friday-morning-in-new-england-rhode-island-massachusetts#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog/northern-lights-likely-to-be-visible-thursday-night-into-friday-morning-in-new-england-rhode-island-massachusetts#\"}see the Northern Lights just after sunset{/a}. Temperatures start to warm up again on Friday with highs back in the mid-60s under plentiful sunshine. Saturday will be a picture perfect fall day with highs in the low 80s. Clouds increase on Sunday ahead of our next low pressure center with a chance for showers arriving by Sunday night into Monday.{ }{/p}{p}A strong cold front will usher in a cooler blast of temperatures next week. Highs by Tuesday and Wednesday will likely be in the mid-50s, and there's potential for a more widespread frost/freeze by the mid to later part of next week.{ }{/p}{p}{strong}Storm Team 10 Weather Blog:{/strong} {a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog\"}Read the latest weather news and headlines for Southern New England{/a}{/p}{p}Tonight: Mainly clear skies with a slight breeze. Low: 40{/p}{p}Friday: Mostly sunny. High: 66{/p}{p}Saturday: Partly cloudy. High: 71{br}{/p}{p}Sunday: Turning cloudy, chance of showers especially in the evening. High: 62{/p}{p}Monday: Cloudy with morning showers possible. High: 60{br}{/p}{p}Tuesday: Sun and clouds. High: 55{/p}{p}Wednesday: Partly sunny. Chilly start. Low: 37. High: 55{/p}{p}Thursday: Mostly sunny. Cold start. Low: 35. High: 58{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/chimein\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/chimein\"}Submit your weather pictures and videos using Chime In{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/radar\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/radar\"}Track rain and snow using our Interactive Radar{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/maps\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/maps\"}View the latest weather maps here{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/webcams\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/webcams\"}Check local conditions using our Skycam Network{/a}{strong}{br}{/strong}{/p}
